title: Drawing, "Design for a Woven Hanging:  Leafstudy", 1950–70
medium: Felt tip marker over graphite on two sheets of joined graph paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite along left and right edges:  X ( two times, one above the other); along lower edge at left:  grey linen warp top/silk warp/silk tabby[?] or other color silk/leaves inlay wool like H.V./ rather open warp.; along lower edge, center left:  letters centered/[descriptive drawing] outlines of/leaves start of double.  Begin & End warps/together [...].
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Large overlapping leaves facing in different directions in pink and green and other colors.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for a Woven Hanging:  Leafstudy", 1950–70.Felt tip marker over graphite on two sheets of joined graph paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-79.
